chart_description: The IPVS Bandwidth chart shows the bandwidth for incoming (received) and outgoing (sent) traffic in kilobits per second (kb/s) on the IP Virtual Server (IPVS) network. IPVS is a Linux kernel module that implements Layer 4 load balancing and can be used as a load balancer to distribute incoming network traffic across multiple backend servers.

dimension_descriptions.received: The received dimension measures the bandwidth of incoming network traffic in kilobits per second (kb/s) on the IPVS network.
dimension_descriptions.sent: The sent dimension measures the bandwidth of outgoing network traffic in kilobits per second (kb/s) on the IPVS network.
